name: marinara
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sauce made of tomatoes, onions, and herbs, eaten especially with pasta: The lamb meatballs in marinara were delicious. penne with peppers in a marinara sauce
More examplesFewer examplesSpread some marinara in the bottom of a baking dish. Cook for about 3 minutes then pour in the marinara sauce.He had a heaped plate of spaghetti with marinara sauce.

(of a dish, especially pasta) served with a sauce made of tomatoes, onions, and herbs: I had spaghetti marinara, which was particularly delicious. Chicken marinara is a simple and healthy dish.
More examplesFewer examplesWe had Italian sausage, green and red peppers served with linguini marinara.I recommend the seafood marinara.
